duties_responsibilities.duty: Exercise safe driving practices and ensure the safety of the public while transporting live poultry from growers to the processing facility.
Comply with all Department of Transportation regulations and perform pre-trip inspections.
Assist with loading and unloading trailer, ensuring a secure load before movement.
Maintain proper documentation and report truck and equipment maintenance issues.
Ensure compliance with all safety rules, regulations, and company policies.
Work in outside environment, sit and drive for extended periods, lift heavy loads, and work in noisy and odorous environments.

education_certification.credential: Valid Class A CDL with 1 year verifiable satisfactory driving record
